review: Had Chromecast before this, and now I am fully converted to Fire TV Stick. Great product!
author: Joe

review: Excellent product so far. Much more pleased with it than chrome cast
easy to use.  enjoyed watching movies, tv and more right away.
author: Grandma

review: Works great with Amazon Prime video streaming but not working with Netflix as advertised!!!!
author: Nguyen V.

review: It's a little bit irrelevant. I bought it because I always buy these things, but also because I was hoping it would be a good travel option. The need to plug it in cancels out the usefulness for travel, at which point I'd just grab the appletv or the roku, which have an overall better functionality.
author: asarstar

review: I bought 2 of these to replace the non kid-friendly chromcasts for my kids' rooms.
author: Mary C. Chaplin
